name: Aave Boosted
description: This Boosted pool's underlying mechanics are powered by wrapped Aave tokens, which generate yield from lending activities on the Aave protocol, resulting in continuous appreciation of the pool's total value.

name: Morpho Boosted
description: This Boosted pool's underlying mechanics are powered by wrapped Morpho vault tokens. Morpho Vaults generate yield from over-collateralized lending. Borrowers deposit collateral and borrow liquidity from the underlying markets, paying interest to the vault.

name: Avalon Boosted
description: This Boosted pool's underlying mechanics are powered by wrapped Avalon tokens, which generate yield from lending activities on the Avalon protocol, resulting in continuous appreciation of the pool's total value.

name: Silo Boosted
description: This Boosted pool's underlying mechanics are powered by wrapped Silo tokens, which generate yield from lending activities on the Silo protocol, resulting in continuous appreciation of the pool's total value.

name: Beefy Boosted
description: This Boosted pool's underlying mechanics are powered by Beefy Vaults, which generate yield from lending activities on the Silo protocol, resulting in continuous appreciation of the pool's total value.
